member.name: IStreamConcatenate.Append
member.summary: Appends a stream to this stream.
member.param: An IStream interface of the stream to append to this stream.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IStreamConcatenate.Append2
member.summary: Appends an array of streams to this stream.
member.param: Array of IStream interfaces of the streams to append to this stream.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IStreamConcatenate.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes this stream from two input streams.
member.param: An IStream interface of the first stream to add to this stream.
An IStream interface of the second stream to add to this stream.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate the required memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

One or more arguments are not valid.
Value: 0x80070057

member.name: IStreamConcatenate.Initialize2
member.summary: Initializes this stream from an array of input streams.
member.param: Array of IStream interfaces of the streams to add to this stream.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate the required memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

This stream has already been initialized.
Value: 0x80070057

summary.para: Use this interface to combine several data streams into a single stream.
To create an instance of this interface, call the CoCreateInstance function. Use__uuidof(MsftStreamConcatenate) for the class identifier and __uuidof(IStreamConcatenate) for the interface identifier.
